data.title: Your College Application Manager
data.meta_description: Prep Me helps reduce your stress by managing your college applications. From task tracking to test prep and even essay writing, we cover your college needs.
data.text:
Testimonials

On a collegiate campus, you'll be managing deadlines, long-term projects and papers, and operating more independently than ever before in your life. In order to get there, you need to manage application deadlines, essays, coordinate with letter of recommendation writers, etc. Seize the opportunity to practice being proactive and organized!

A. Tucker, School Counselor

Getting and staying organized is one of the most important ways to get through the college application process. Using this tool will help ensure you stay on track!

A. Thompson, College and Career Counselor

There are so many aspects to the application: essays, school records, sending test scores, recommendation letters, activity resume, deadlines - it is hard to keep track of everything! Early organization to the college application process and using all school and counselor support are important to help students accomplish what they need to during their senior year.

J. Feldkamp-Pradhan, School Counselor
